channel.title: My internet connection is really slow
channel.description: I have an internet connection of 256Kbps. But on average when i download im only getting 4kpbs. This is getting really annoying. What do you think is wrong? And how could i make it faster?

item.title: My internet connection is really slow
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

xxlegitxx:

I don’t think any ISPs offer 1.5-3.5 kB/s plans.

Well… Maybe dialup. But anyways, yeah when I had 256kbps, I always had at least 20 per second.

Run a speed test, then contact your ISP. They are not giving you speeds that they are promised, so interrogate them until they confess. Ask your parents for a new ISP if you have to…

Read full topic

@jme wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:15, topic:31176”]How the f do you guys get such low dl speeds? If you have a decent modem, you should get blazing speeds. What does
www.speakeasy.net/speedtest/
give you as your dl and ul speeds?[/quote]
Well of course your plan with your ISP has more to do with it then anything else.

item.source: My internet connection is really slow

item.title: My internet connection is really slow
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Just to let you know, there is a difference between a kb(kilobit), and a kB(kilobyte). 1 kB is 8 kb

So, if they tell you your download speed is 256 kbps, then that means the fastest your gonna get for a download is really 32 kB/s, and that’s only if you have good hardware(router, modem) and if the server you are downloading from is fast and isn’t far away from you. But your right, you should definitly be getting more then that because that’s what I used to get on dialup.

Read full topic

item.source: My internet connection is really slow

item.title: My internet connection is really slow
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“wyn10, post:10, topic:31176”]same with me but i know why.

I have msn, rs, scar, music and tons of stuff downloading all at the same time and on a laptop, Also youtube videos’s XD[/quote]

Umm…they can’t cap you for that. They only cap uploads, because if you share too much via BT, they claim you are wasting bandwidth.

And distracted, do you have optimum where you are? 30 bucks a month for 4 mb/s. Is your modem old? Because that was my problem.

Read full topic
